TAXII Project Documentation

Start here if you're new to TAXII!

Regardless of whether you're an analyst, developer, or manager, we have tutorials, walkthroughs, and exercises to help you become familiar with TAXII.

Get Started »

Documentation

Now that you have an idea of what TAXII is and how it can be used, get a more in-depth view of TAXII.

Documentation »

Developers

You can also see developer documentation for TAXII.

Developers »

Have questions, comments, or feedback? Want to set up a teleconference or in-person meeting?
Reach out to us at stix-taxii@hq.dhs.gov!

Teleconferences

We're always happy to set up a teleconference to go through an introductory session, a more in-depth training/development session, or to walk you through how to map your existing information exchanges into TAXII.

Get in touch with us via email to arrange one!

In-Person Meetings

Prefer an in-person meeting? We can meet with you in person for any of the purposes we would also cover via teleconference. Send us an email to schedule a meeting.

Training Sessions

We host occasional training sessions that are free and open to the public. Information on these can be found on the training page.
